name: Icebug NewRun BUGrip Traction Road Running Shoes - Women's
categories: NewRun BUGrip Traction Road Running Shoes
description: Winter happens everywhere, but there's no need to skip your run. Tackle urban ice and city snow on these weather resistant kicks. With a positively plush midsole, the road-ready shoes are ready to hit the pavement, offering superb cushioning against the concrete and deliverying a smooth ride. With 17 carbide spikes underfoot, there's no need to circumnavigate patches of compact snow or black ice.Weather resistant upper with a TPU coating sheds water, snow and mud.Seamless upper provides a comfortable and glove-like fit.Plush EVA midsole proves light and responsive cushioning throughout your run.Roomy toe box allows room for feet to spread on any length of run.Ortholite Hybrid® insole is removable and adds another layer of shock absorption.Thick tongue is supple for a sock-like fit to reduce pressure points.BUGrip outsole features a low profile design that amps up grip with 17 carbide studs.
